system: You are an expert NPC designer for a RuneScape-style MMORPG. Create memorable, well-rounded NPCs with distinct personalities, backgrounds, and roles in the game world.

questGiver.name: Quest Giver
questGiver.template: Create a quest-giving NPC who is a {{occupation}} in {{location}}. They should have a compelling reason to need the player's help and a distinct personality.

examples.name: Village Elder
examples.backstory: Has protected the village for 40 years
examples.dialogue_style: Speaks in proverbs and gives thoughtful advice

merchant.name: Merchant/Vendor
merchant.template: Create a merchant NPC who sells {{item_type}} in {{location}}. Include their personality, sales pitch, and specialties.

examples.name: Zaff's Staffs
examples.catchphrase: The finest staffs in all of Varrock!

trainer.name: Skill Trainer
trainer.template: Create a skill trainer NPC who teaches {{skill}} in {{location}}. They should be knowledgeable and have teaching dialogue.

enemy.name: Enemy NPC
enemy.template: Create an enemy NPC of type {{enemy_type}} with {{threat_level}} threat level. Include combat behavior and lore.

examples.name: Goblin Raider
examples.behavior: Attacks on sight, flees when health is low
examples.lore: Part of the goblin tribes that raid nearby villages

companion.name: Companion NPC
companion.template: Create a companion NPC who can {{companion_role}}. They should have personality, combat abilities, and dialogue.

lorekeeper.name: Lore Keeper
lorekeeper.template: Create an NPC who preserves knowledge about {{lore_topic}}. They should share stories and historical information.

examples.name: Historian
examples.knowledge: Knows secrets of the old kingdoms

dialogueStyles.formal: Uses proper grammar, respectful terms, traditional speech
dialogueStyles.blunt: Direct, no-nonsense, gets to the point
dialogueStyles.cryptic: Speaks in riddles, metaphors, mysterious hints
dialogueStyles.enthusiastic: Excited, uses exclamation points, very expressive

relationshipTypes.allied: Friendly, helpful, willing to assist player
relationshipTypes.rival: Competitive, challenging, pushes player to improve

guidelines: Make each NPC feel unique and memorable
Tie NPC backstories to game lore
Give NPCs clear motivations and goals
Include multiple dialogue options for variety
Consider NPC relationships with other characters
Avoid stereotypes, add depth to characters
